reviewText: I am still looking for the newest one made in 2012 or 2013 of Que Bonita Amor please try and get it for me Thank You. Let me know if is out DVD
An absolute Spanish Classic. I love it!
This movie is great it is funny and has a great romance going on. I love that I was able to find this film quick and it is of great quality.
esta movie es muy buena para los romanticos, se la recomiendo ,,me sente a verla y despues a los 4 dias la volvi a ver pq es muy buena me recordo muchos atras.. se la recominendo

Great movie..!!  Don Antonio Aguilar, Latin America's most respected charro, and La Madre de la musica Ranchera, Lola Beltran.  What a cast!!  And the music is awesome..  You hear the old classic songs done by many artists, but when you hear the original versions - there is just no comparison.  This is no exception.  The movie is funny, The music is wonderful and just to see Antonio Aguilar and Lola Beltran together is such a treat.  En Paz descanse "El Charro de Mexico", y "La Reina de La Cancion Ranchera"

It is so good to hear Antonio Aguilar and Lola Beltran sing the songs of Jose Alfredo Jimenez.  This movie especially is fun to watch as both actors challenge each other in put downs through songs and seemingly in a race for President of the municipality.  Great fun!
